creator: Joerg-Cyril.Hoehle@t-systems.com
text:
When switching between viewresults, table results and graph results, the
outer horizontal scrollbar is not systematically refreshed, and thus does not
correspond to the visible portion of the results frame.
The visible portion of the window is correctly remembered (e.g. rightmost for
viewresults, leftmost for the two others). The scrollbar may remain leftmost.

It behaves as follow:
misses:
- between graph and view results
- between aggregate and view results
ok:
+ between table and view results
+ between assertion and view results
+ between table and graph results.

(about outer and inner horizontal scrollbars see #2520

I suppose than this bug is now obsolete (I can reproduce with last svn trunk).
Closed, please re-open if not.
creator: milamber@apache.org
